This class implements the Alien child class of the Elements class

E

Elements - class Elements.
This class contains the data and polymorphic methods needed to create and draw the elements of the game.
Elements(int, int) - Constructor for class Elements
Constructs and initializes the top left corner of the object.
enemy - Variable in class Final.DrawPanel
 

F

Final - class Final.
Author Michael Norton 12/10/03.
Functional Purpose: To create a game that reasonably emulates Space Invaders, including; aliens, the player's spaceship, and bullets.
Educational Purpose: To create a program that uses features from the entire year.
Final.DrawPanel - class Final.DrawPanel.
Makes a panel that draws itself.
Final.DrawPanel() - Constructor for class Final.DrawPanel
sets the background color and starts the moving aliens thread
Final(String) - Constructor for class Final
Adds the spacePanel to the frame and allowed the usre to close the window.

h - Variable in class Elements

This is the universal method to move the aliens down the screen.
